text: O. J. Simpson is eligible for parole in just one year and it turns out his first order of business will be to find Kris Jenner and date her! Do you think he has a chance? O. J. Simpson has the hots for Kris Jenner. The former NFL star is currently serving time in prison for armed robbery and battery but his time in prison is possibly coming to an end. Now that O. J. is about to be up for a parole and a new report claims he wants to date the famous momager because he ’ s “ always had a crush on her. ” He ’ s supposedly been pining for her while behind bars and his crush goes back 30 years. “ O. J. has had a crush on Kris forever, ” Ian Halperin, author of Kardashian Dynasty
